text: Bellevigny is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Belleville-sur-Vie (the seat) and Saligny.Arrêté préfectoral 19 November 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Bellevigny
